name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
description: Modern lodging with an exercise room, plus a free airport shuttle, breakfast bar & WiFi.

owner.name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond (Owner)

address: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond, 9351 Bridgeport Rd, Richmond, BC V6X 1S3

featured_reviews.review_id: Great experience, from the time that I took the complimentary shadow from the Airport to The hotel Holiday Inn Express Richmond, the driver Dean, Dean, he was very nice and courteous,  he gave me a lot of information of how to get around the hotel, restaurants and places to visit,  The staff at Front Desk where nice and professional. The rooms are nice clean and comfortable, Breakfast was good and enough to get you started and ready for your day. I stayed here 2 weekend's in a row total of 4 nights. The housekeeper Li (both w-ends) was very nice and friendly. The hotel is well located, conveniently close to the airport (24/7 complimentary shuttle or if you are driving secure parking is available) close to the Bridgeport Station (about 10 minutes walk) where you can take the TransLink Metro, Vancouver's transportation network, it will allow you to go anywhere, either by train or bus. Next door to the hotel there is Costco, and a few restaurants that are walking distance.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Tani Jesus Garcia,

We appreciate you providing a detailed overview of your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear you have enjoyed your accommodation, please think of us again the next time you are visiting the area. 

Regards
Eric Li
Guest Services Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
Top notch people as staff here, friendly even helped me when my hands were full by setting my floor level in elevator.  Loved how they went above and beyond then respected our space when napping. Great location, buttery soft beds, pillows and bedding. Great products in the room for our comfort. Continental breakfast was actually cooked in kitchen, meals, food prep and serving set up was all immaculate.
Best hotel stay yet.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Josephine Burrows,

Thank you so much for your kind words. We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was your best hotel experience yet. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay. 

Regards
Eric Li
GSM

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: The front desk staff were helpful and friendly- we felt very welcome there. It was wonderful to have a hot breakfast included with a good variety of options considering the small dining area. The room was clean and with modernized design. Great place! Negative: The elevator & general lobby area are very small so it can be cramped with a lot of people around but nothing that would ruin the experience.
featured_reviews.review_text: Positive: The front desk staff were helpful and friendly- we felt very welcome there. It was wonderful to have a hot breakfast included with a good variety of options considering the small dining area. The room was clean and with modernized design. Great place! Negative: The elevator & general lobby area are very small so it can be cramped with a lot of people around but nothing that would ruin the experience.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Housekeeping Rocks!

The beds and pillows so comfortable, the shower great water pressure. The workout room so clean, with three treadmills 
 even a washroom, scale, and a rowing machine, (Which I was too tired to try but next time.) I usually don't even bother wiping down after using gym in other hotels because they are so filthy, this one I did as I respect the housekeeping. I didn't have any cash when I checked out to leave the housekeeping but I saw they had a ATM in the lobby, so before my shuttle left I asked if I could go back up to the room so they gave me another key and I rushed up and gave 20.00 (they deserve more but not a rich person) to the housekeeper cleaning my room...they deserve it as I feel they are the ones who can keep a hotel successful!

featured_reviews.review_id: The staff was really nice and helpful and the rooms definitely seemed new and updated (though, to be honest, a little dark. they could have used a little more light as it was hard to see into my luggage - i had to use my phone flashlight) but good lord was it loud!! I should have realized it was a bad sign when the hotel room provided a sound machine for "restful sleep". All the rooms face the Costco, which unloads trucks all night long. Because of that noise I probably would not return here, which is a shame because it was very convenient to the airport.

GSM

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: We arrived at the hotel early, and the front desk clerk let us check into a room within 15 minutes. She directed us to a good nearby restaurant. Later I called down to ask for a shower chair, and one was brought up immediately. Service was excellent!
featured_reviews.review_text: Positive: We arrived at the hotel early, and the front desk clerk let us check into a room within 15 minutes. She directed us to a good nearby restaurant. Later I called down to ask for a shower chair, and one was brought up immediately. Service was excellent!

featured_reviews.review_id: Happy with the hotel, and location with a few restaurants beside the hotel. I was glad to get an early check in and out due to flight timings.  Efficient shuttle bus service to airport round trip. Light breakfast was good with a few meat items,and bakery.
featured_reviews.review_text: Happy with the hotel, and location with a few restaurants beside the hotel. I was glad to get an early check in and out due to flight timings.  Efficient shuttle bus service to airport round trip. Light breakfast was good with a few meat items,and bakery.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Chitra Kowlessar,

Thank you for taking the time to complete this review, we are pleased to hear you have enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to your next visit! 

Regards
Eric Li
Guest Services Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: The staff was very accommodating and allowed us to have a late check-out at no extra charge. The room was pleasant, the included breakfast was good and the shuttle service to the airport was great. We also appreciated the hotel having a luggage scale. Negative: The bathtub in the bathroom had paint peeling off from the inside of it.
featured_reviews.review_text: Positive: The staff was very accommodating and allowed us to have a late check-out at no extra charge. The room was pleasant, the included breakfast was good and the shuttle service to the airport was great. We also appreciated the hotel having a luggage scale.
